table.name: vtiger_taskpackage
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_taskpackage` ( `taskpackageid` int(11) NOT NULL, `taskpackagename` varchar(100) default NULL, `creatorid` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `createdtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modifiedby` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`taskpackageid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
